media:group.media:title: Answering YOUR Questions about Tourettes
media:group.media:description:
Support me on patreon: https://www.patreon.com/dapz1
Bloopers: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=94s5N16ecTg

So I know I said in the video that I would write a few paragraphs on why neurological vs mental is a bit complicated, and I'm lazy so I'm gonna keep it brief. Keep in mind this is an opinion from a non professional but after reading a lot of papers and talking to some people in the industry, I don't think there is a clear cut distinction between what is defined as neurological and what is defined as mental, it's sort of a gradient. Some people define neurological disorders and diseases as things about the brain that can be physically seen and diagnosed from there, and then mental disorders are stuff that affect mood and behavior, and the way people think. But then theres stuff like schizophrenia which has characteristics of both

This is truly a dapz tourettes syndrome tics ticsandroses what is tourettes coprolalia sweet anita tiks ticks in your dreams q&a moment
